title: App won't load
description: When I try to open the app, it just shows a white screen and then crashes. This started happening after the latest update. I've tried reinstalling but same issue. iPhone 14, iOS 17.2.

title: Payment failed but money taken
description: I tried to purchase the premium plan and got an error message saying payment failed. But my credit card was charged $49.99! This is unacceptable. I need a refund immediately.

title: Slow dashboard
description: The dashboard takes forever to load. Sometimes 30+ seconds. It used to be fast.

title: Can't reset password
description: Clicked forgot password, entered my email, but never received the reset link. Checked spam folder too. Email is definitely correct: john@example.com

title: Button color wrong
description: The 'Submit' button on the contact form is blue but according to the design specs it should be green. Not urgent but wanted to report.

title: URGENT: All user data gone!!!
description: Logged in this morning and ALL my projects are missing! 3 years of work just GONE. This is a DISASTER. I need this fixed NOW.

title: Export to PDF not working
description: When I try to export my report to PDF, I get a 500 error. Console shows: 'TypeError: Cannot read property of undefined'. Happens every time on Chrome.

title: Would be nice to have dark mode
description: Not sure if this is the right place, but it would be really nice if you could add dark mode. My eyes hurt when using the app at night.

title: Login loop
description: After entering correct credentials, I get redirected back to the login page. Happens on both Chrome and Firefox. Started after I enabled 2FA.

title: API returns 401 randomly
description: Our integration with your API randomly gets 401 errors even with valid tokens. Happens maybe 5% of the time. Token is definitely not expired.

title: Typo on homepage
description: The word 'recieve' should be 'receive' in the hero section.

title: Can't upload files over 10MB
description: Trying to upload a 15MB video and getting 'file too large' error. The docs say limit is 50MB. Is this a bug or did the limit change?

title: Charts not rendering on mobile
description: The analytics charts just show blank space on my Android phone. Works fine on desktop. Pixel 7, Chrome mobile.

title: Duplicate charges on subscription
description: I was charged twice for my January subscription. Transaction IDs: TXN-8847 and TXN-8849. Both for $29.99. Please refund one.

title: Search is broken
description: Search doesn't find anything anymore. I type in keywords that I know exist in my documents but get 'no results found'.

title: Notifications not working
description: I'm not getting any email notifications even though they're enabled in settings. Push notifications work fine though.

title: SSO login fails silently
description: When using Okta SSO, clicking login does nothing. No error message, just stays on the same page. Regular email login works.

title: Data export shows wrong dates
description: Exported my data and all the dates are off by one day. Created on Jan 5 shows as Jan 4 in the export.

title: Memory leak in long sessions
description: App gets progressively slower the longer I use it. After about 2 hours, it becomes unusable. Have to refresh the page.

title: Feature request: bulk delete
description: Please add ability to select multiple items and delete them at once. Currently have to delete one by one which is tedious.

title: API rate limit too low
description: Getting rate limited after only 100 requests per minute. Our previous limit was 500/min. Was this changed intentionally?

title: Cannot reproduce user report
description: A user reported they can't save forms, but I tested extensively and everything works fine. Might be user error?

title: Accessibility: missing alt text
description: Screen reader users report that product images don't have alt text. This is a WCAG violation.

title: prod db connection timeout
description: Getting intermittent 'connection timeout' errors on prod database. Happens during peak hours around 2-3pm EST. Check connection pooling?

title: App crashes on file preview
description: Whenever I try to preview a .docx file, the app crashes. PDF files work fine. Started happening this week.
